name: ThingSmartBLEKit
prefix_header_contents:
#ifdef __OBJC__

  #import <YYModel/YYModel.h>
  #import "ThingSmartBLEKit.h"
  #import "ThingBLEPrivateConf.h"
  #import "ThingBLENotificationKeys.h"
  #import <ThingBluetooth/ThingBluetooth.h>
  
  #undef ThingLog
  #undef ThingSDKLogDebug
  #undef ThingSDKLogInfo
  #undef ThingSDKLogWarn
  #undef ThingSDKLogError
  #define ThingSDKLogDebug(...)         ThingSDKLog(0, @"ThingSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define ThingSDKLogInfo(...)         ThingSDKLog(1, @"ThingSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define ThingSDKLogWarn(...)         ThingSDKLog(2, @"ThingSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define ThingSDKLogError(...)         ThingSDKLog(3, @"ThingSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define ThingBLELogInfo(id, step, ...)         ThingSDKLogInfo(@"-> %@ -> %@ -> %@", id, step, __VA_ARGS__)
    
    #define ThingBleLogDebug(...)           ThingSDKLog(0, @"ThingSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
    #define ThingBleLogInfo(...)           ThingSDKLog(1, @"ThingSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
    #define ThingBleLogWarn(...)           ThingSDKLog(2, @"ThingSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
    #define ThingBleLogError(...)           ThingSDKLog(3, @"ThingSmartBLEKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
#endif
